name: @jfstech/logger
description: A custom logger for Node.JS created by JFS-Tech
author: Joshua Epstein <josh@jfstech.uk>

hooks.pre-push: pnpm run prettier:fix && pnpm run tsc && pnpm run test:update

scripts.ci-check: pnpm run prettier && pnpm run tsc
scripts.prettier:
prettier --list-different 'src/**/*.ts' || (echo '
Please fix code formatting by running:
pnpm run prettier:fix'; exit 1)
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run reinstall && pnpm run ci-check && pnpm run build
